it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net

Interface Packet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArpPacket, DataPacket, EthPacket, Icmp6DestinationUnreachableMessage, Icmp6EchoReplyMessage, Icmp6EchoRequestMessage, Icmp6Message, Icmp6NeighborAdvertisementMessage, Icmp6NeighborSolicitationMessage, Icmp6RouterAdvertisementMessage, Icmp6RouterSolicitationMessage, Icmp6TimeExceededMessage, IcmpDestinationUnreachableMessage, IcmpEchoReplyMessage, IcmpEchoRequestMessage, IcmpMessage, IcmpParameterProblemMessage, IcmpRedirectMessage, IcmpSourceQuenchMessage, IcmpTimeExceededMessage, Ip4Packet, Ip6Packet, OspfLSUPacket, OspfPacket, P1Packet, PppEncapsulation, SlipPacket, TcpPacket, TunPacket, UdpPacket

    public interface Packet
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Generic network packet. It has a source address and a destination address.

        int getBytes(byte[] buf,
             int off)
        Gets a the entire packet in a byte array.
        Parameters:
        buf - the buffer where the packet has to be written
        off - the offset within the buffer

      • getBytes

        byte[] getBytes()
        Gets a the entire packet in a byte array.
        Returns:
